about_the_game:
Gameplay Objective:

  • Get the Star safely to the Ground

  • Click on other Blocks to remove them or interact with them

  • Let Gravity and Physics do its work

  • Success!

Level Editor & Online Levels:

  • Multiple Level Sizes and Visual Styles

  • Various fun Game Mechanics (Hazards, Bombs, Moving Platforms, Portals & More)

  • Make fun, creative and exciting levels

  • Upload and Share your level with others online

  • Play levels made by others!

Features:

  • 50 Starter Levels to play - Giving you chance to learn the mechanics and have some fun

  • 50 Bonus Levels - Even more free levels to enjoy

  • Level Editor: Create and share your own unique levels with friends

  • Block Database: Play more levels online from around the world from strangers and friends

  • Can be played locally with friend with 2 controllers for puzzle co-op solving

  • Achievements

  • Cloud Saves - Sync up your levels across devices as well as with the Main Version

Want More? Check Out The Full Game!

Enjoyed making custom Levels or playing the Online Levels and want more? Check out the full game (Drop It: Block Paradise!) to unlock the Arcade Mode & Full Bonus Mode to gain 200+ more levels, a fun Versus Mode and more Achievements and unlocks. Your custom levels you made will be synced between both games so you can pick back up where you started!
